name: Fortune & Gloria
description:
Fortune & Gloria is an action platformer where you and a friend (optional) save the day in procedurally generated missions!

Grab your trusty assault rifle, a handful of grenades, and join Nate "Fortune" Cobb and Gloria Guerrero on a mission to rescue hostages, take out the bad guys and blow stuff up!

Featuring:
  • Couch co-op action! Grab a friend, sit on the couch together and blow stuff up!
  • Singleplayer experience: switch between characters and command your ally to wait behind or follow you into action!
  • Unlimited mission levels through procedural generation for infinite re-playability
  • Environments as diverse as desert, snow and urban, and more
  • Fight enemies like gangs, gun runners and terrorists
  • Set the difficulty level to match your play style, from casual to hardcore
